scripts.cf:build: npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/assets/_worker.js && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/assets/ && echo '{"version":1,"include":["/*"],"exclude":["/_next/static/*","/_next/image*","/favicon.ico","/favicon.png"]}' > .open-next/assets/_routes.json
scripts.cf:preview: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler pages dev .open-next/assets
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler pages deploy .open-next/assets
